article_title: Demand for Fort Mill boy’s papers sparks panic
article_text:
03:30

Seeing double? No, just an unusual number of twins at Gold Hill Middle School

article_metadata.title: Demand for Fort Mill boy’s papers sparks panic | The Herald

og.description: A health-insurance filing glitch led the federal marketplace to seek citizenship documents for a disabled Fort Mill boy. By the time his mom realized the query was legit, it was almost too late.
og.title: Demand for Fort Mill boy’s papers sparks panic
